Factsheet

Developer:
Yannis ATTARD
Based in France
Release date:
Platforms:
Windows and Mac
Website:
noemieszm.itch.io/self-control
Regular Price:
Free

Description

In Self Control, you have to take pictures with your coworkers during a party

History

This game was made with Unity. I did it with 4 friends during the Pixel Challenge, a 47 hours game jam in Quebec city. I was the only programmer. I did the game system, the sounds and graphic integration, but also some game design. It was the smoothest game jam I've ever made. I even had enough time to code a cool end and a nice menu !

Features

  • Unity
  • Sounds integration using Wwise
  • Graphic assets integration
  • Implemented all the gameplay
  • One of the best RPS's free game of the week (04/15/2017)
  • Also featured in Waypoint.vice
  • Won the honorable mention in Pixel Challenge student category (2nd place)
